credit_line: Gift of George W. George, Class of 1941
title: Day For Remembering
medium: graphite | ink | white ink | on paper
inscriptions: u.c. in ink: DAY FOR REMEMBERING - [crossed out]; l.r. in image in ink: RUBE GOLDBERG.; l.c. in pencil: 3 col 10am [illegible words]/ Hold in Edit Page [crossed out in red pencil]; l.c. in red pencil: 5 7/8 " line cut; l.r. in pencil: 53.4; l.r. in ink: AROUND WASHINGTON'S BIRTHDAY [crossed out]; l.l. in pencil, erased: [small sketch of a man's profile, probably Washington's, from finished image]; verso u.l.: [remenant of old blue label]; verso l.l. in pencil: 77[encircled]
